items.title: City council member faces additional charges in absentee ballot investigation

items.title: Trump’s global tariffs are unlawful, appeals court says
items.description: A federal appeals court has ruled that most of President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs are unlawful.

items.title: WATCH:  Trump cuts nearly $5B of foreign aid
items.description: President Donald Trump told Congress that he will slash $4.9 billion of congressionally-approved USAID and State Department foreign aid funding.
